item.title: Dell: This is the perspective of Singaporean business leaders on the future of human-machine interaction
item.description:
A significant shift towards human-machine partnerships is underway, but business leaders in the Asia Pacific and Japan (APJ) region hold differing views on its implications, according to a global study by Dell Technologies. While 80% of APJ business leaders anticipate humans and machines functioning as integrated teams within five years, their outlook on this future is divided. While a majority (58%) of Singaporean business leaders believe automation will increase their free time, opinions are split on the broader societal effects...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dell-this-is-the-perspective-of-singaporean-business-leaders-on-the-future-of-human-machine-interaction/

item.title: 2030 Food: Sustainable, Healthier, Personalized
item.description:
- Businesses for Good: In the future, successful companies will be those committed to improving the well-being of both the planet and its people. - Personalized Nutrition: Technological advancements will allow consumers to create highly customized approaches to enhance their physical and mental health. Source: Mintel. - Tech-Driven Food Solutions: Consumer confidence in food science and technology will grow as these become essential for securing the food supply. Mintel, a market research firm focused on consumer insights, has identified three significant trends expected to shape the global food, drink, and food service industries in the coming decade:..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/2030-food-sustainable-healthier-personalized/
